code: @Test public void testJmxDumpRoutesAsXml() throws Exception {     MBeanServer mbeanServer = getMBeanServer().     ObjectName on = ObjectName.getInstance("org.apache.camel:context=localhost/camel-1,type=context,name=\"camel-1\"").     String xml = (String) mbeanServer.invoke(on, "dumpRoutesAsXml", null, null).     assertNotNull(xml).     log.info(xml).     assertTrue(xml.contains("route")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("myRoute")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("myOtherRoute")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("direct:start")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("mock:result")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("seda:bar")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("mock:bar")). }
